episodes.overview: Rollins and Fin investigate an assault in Kentucky that has striking similarities to that of a victim found in Central Park. Benson receives intel that turns the case upside down.

episodes.name: Tangled Strands of Justice
episodes.overview: Garland asks Benson to reopen a missing persons case he worked as a rookie officer.  A victim in one of Carisi’s recent cases is arrested.

episodes.name: Did You Believe In Miracles? (1)
episodes.overview:
When a student's school reports a girl missing, the squad must track down a trusted family friend for answers. Benson gets a Mother's Day surprise.

(Continues in Law & Order: Organized Crime S02E20)

episodes.name: Confess Your Sins to Be Free
episodes.overview: When the only evidence in a crime is a church confession, Carisi must find another way to prove his suspect guilty. Benson agrees to meet with an old friend seeking to make amends for past transgressions.

episodes.name: A Final Call at Forlini's Bar
episodes.overview: The SVU provides help and protection for a longtime domestic violence victim, but when she winds up at the defendant's table in court, Rollins surprises Carisi with a formidable opponent at trial.

episodes.name: Gimme Shelter (2)
episodes.overview: A girl is shot and Cosgrove teams with Det. Jalen Shaw to track down her killer. Benson and Stabler assist and realize it's more than a typical homicide. McCoy and Price seek justice against an international crime ring.

episodes.name: The One You Feed
episodes.overview: A group of teens terrorizing tourists has the SVU squad working overtime. McGrath teams them up with the Bronx gang unit to track down a crucial lead.

episodes.name: Mirror Effect
episodes.overview: Benson tries to help a pop star in a volatile relationship. Rollins struggles with taking the stress of work home with her. Fin teaches a rookie a lesson in respecting fellow officers.

episodes.name: The Steps We Cannot Take
episodes.overview: A home invasion and kidnapping lead the SVU to a shocking discovery. Muncy tries to fit in with the squad.

episodes.name: Breakwater
episodes.overview: A young man asks the SVU for help when he suspects his boss is preying on his sister. Velasco tries to convince a reluctant witness to testify in court.

episodes.name: Controlled Burn
episodes.overview: Rollins investigates an assault by a masked man at an underground party. Benson uncovers a suspect who may be valuable as a witness.

episodes.name: Dead Ball
episodes.overview: When the case against a popular sports star falls through, Benson digs into the suspect's past to uncover additional victims. Velasco is disappointed when he meets one of his heroes.

episodes.name: A Better Person
episodes.overview: The SVU hunts for a violent suspect who killed a detective's child. Rollins ponders a potential opportunity.

episodes.name: And a Trauma in a Pear Tree
episodes.overview: Carisi and Rollins work together on an important arraignment. Benson tries to make Noah's Christmas wish come true when a case falls in her lap.

episodes.name: Jumped In
episodes.overview: When Benson becomes the target of a ruthless gang leader, Captain Duarte takes the case. Fin works with the Bronx SVU to help clear their case backlog. Lieutenant Dixon offers to translate when a deaf student is raped.

episodes.name: Soldier Up
episodes.overview: While Benson tries to help the gang member who attacked her, Duarte reveals a shocking piece of evidence in the case. Fin is tasked with hiring new detectives for the Bronx SVU.

episodes.name: Blood Out
episodes.overview: As Benson and Carisi put a vengeful crime boss on trial, Fin tries to help a woman who was drugged and left for dead. Velasco takes drastic action to get information from a witness.

episodes.name: Intersection
episodes.overview: A car accident leads the detectives on a search for an ambulance driver assaulting his charges. Fin gives Detective Bruno a tour of Manhattan SVU.

episodes.name: Dutch Tears
episodes.overview: A recently released convict goes looking for his arresting officer, Fin Tutuola. Carisi tries to get an arrest warrant without a positive suspect ID.

episodes.name: King of the Moon
episodes.overview: A man with dementia confesses to murder, but Benson and Carisi believe there's more to the case. When rumors swirl around the squad room, Fin presses Velasco for the truth.

episodes.name: The Presence of Absence
episodes.overview: An internet dating site becomes the source of terror for a young widow. Muncy struggles with Velasco's absence.

episodes.name: Lime Chaser
episodes.overview: The search for a suspect who drugs women's drinks in crowded bars leads the SVU to Muncy's brother. Churlish makes a risky move to impress Benson.

episodes.name: Bubble Wrap
episodes.overview: A construction tycoon interferes with an SVU investigation into her family. Carisi struggles to get an indictment when the complainant backs down.

episodes.name: Bend the Law
episodes.overview: Carisi must tread carefully when Maxwell’s husband becomes a person of interest in an SVU investigation. Benson sends Velasco to take an old friend into custody.

episodes.name: Debatable
episodes.overview: Benson tries to help a student after she's assaulted on a field trip. Fin suspects a witness in the case may not be telling the whole truth.

episodes.name: Bad Things (1)
episodes.overview: Benson and Carisi are baffled when a series of assaults have the same M.O. but different DNA at each crime scene. Muncy believes Elias Olsen has struck again and is determined to prove it.

episodes.name: All Pain Is One Malady (1)
episodes.overview: In the search for a revenge-for-hire crime ring, Benson and Stabler combine forces on a case that has now spread globally. Fin and Bruno help a victim assaulted a second time. Jet's plan to hack the dark web backfires and puts the team in danger.

episodes.name: Tunnel Blind
episodes.overview: As the squad celebrates the birth of Rollins and Carisi's child, another child goes missing in broad daylight.

episodes.name: Truth Embargo
episodes.overview: As Benson teams up with the FBI on an unsolved case, Fin and Velasco investigate a flash mob robbery that led to a sexual assault.

episodes.name: The Punch List
episodes.overview: The SVU helps a man come to terms with being victimized. Benson tries to support a victim's family when tragedy strikes twice.

episodes.name: Duty to Report
episodes.overview: When Chief McGrath's daughter discloses a sexual assault, Benson must balance the intricacies of the investigation with McGrath's impulsive actions.

episodes.name: Zone Rouge
episodes.overview: A cryptic message sends SVU on a new track to find Maddie. Benson tries to help a federal agent when the case hits too close to home. Captain Curry tries to make amends with Fin.

episodes.name: Carousel
episodes.overview: To identify a woman's attacker, the SVU must track down a mysterious suspect targeting tourists staying in hostels.

episodes.name: Probability of Doom
episodes.overview: When a woman turns her husband in for possessing child pornography, the case is complicated by a sudden death. Benson tries to reconnect with a victim she saved.

episodes.name: Third Man Syndrome
episodes.overview: A brutal assault in the street leads Carisi to pursue hate crime charges. Benson must support a homebound witness too scared to speak up.

episodes.name: Children of Wolves
episodes.overview: A teenager found unconscious in the park leads to a missing persons investigation. Benson must help Noah come to terms with the past when he questions the origins of his birth.

episodes.name: Combat Fatigue
episodes.overview: The squad is on edge as Carisi waits for a verdict in Maddie's kidnapping case. Benson tries to help the Flynn family pick up the pieces of their broken life.

episodes.name: Prima Nocta
episodes.overview: A runaway bride calls the SVU for help on the day of her wedding. Rollins pitches in on her day off.

episodes.name: Marauder
episodes.overview: Agent Sykes struggles to cope on the anniversary of her sister's disappearance. Benson suspects a cold case from Manhattan could help her get closure.

episodes.name: Duty to Hope
episodes.overview: The SVU searches for a pattern assailant before his crimes escalate to murder. Fin must contend with a suspect's aggrieved son. Carisi is pressured to close the case quickly to ease public concern.

episodes.name: Fractured
episodes.overview: The SVU investigates a brutal attack on a group of law students. Benson hopes the discovery of a hidden camera will crack the case open. Carisi's best chance at conviction is catching the defendant in a lie.

episodes.name: Excavation
episodes.overview: Devastating repressed memories come back to a woman when she finds an old notebook in her family home. Bringing charges in a decades-old crime proves even more difficult for Carisi when a powerful judge stalls the case.

episodes.name: Divide and Conquer
episodes.overview: A couple's dinner party ends with a violent home invasion and assault by masked men. Rollins suspects the crime is linked to her Intelligence investigation of an international gang of thieves.

episodes.name: Constricted
episodes.overview: A romantic date ends with a teenager fighting for her life in the hospital. Carisi can't help bringing the case home with him as he envisions the dangers ahead for his growing daughters.

episodes.name: Economics of Shame
episodes.overview: When a TV reporter becomes the victim of sextortion that could ruin her career, Benson helps her take back control while Velasco goes undercover as a potential rich target.

episodes.name: Rorschach
episodes.overview: Agent Clay consults with Benson when a woman is found gravely injured at a remote campground and the suspect could be anywhere along the Eastern Seaboard. Bruno and Silva take a chance on an odd hunch to see if it becomes a lead.

episodes.name: Tenfold
episodes.overview: Bruno must get to the center of a victim's incomplete story to track down a serial rapist. Carisi is helpless to stop a crime he suspects is about to be committed.

episodes.name: Cornered
episodes.overview: Carisi tries to protect two women taken hostage in a tense standoff between police and a violent thief. Benson and Rollins devise a risky plan to get everyone to safety.

episodes.name: First Light
episodes.overview: An abhorrent web of lies and betrayal is uncovered when a woman is confronted with video of a night she can't remember. Carisi struggles to move on from his ordeal when the suspect changes his plea.

episodes.name: Master Key
episodes.overview: When a teen from a group home goes missing, the squad has only minutes to determine if he ran away or was abducted. Velasco suspects the system at large is to blame for letting children slip through the cracks.

episodes.name: Deductible
episodes.overview: A young boy seeks help when his sister doesn't come home from work. Benson and Carisi suspect a woman's assault was prearranged by a third party.

episodes.name: Calculated
episodes.overview: When a high school principal busts a student for sexting, the SVU uncovers a sinister case of distribution concerning hundreds of underage students. Silva pleads for leniency for a suspect she believes is innocent.

episodes.name: Extinguished
episodes.overview: Velasco teams up with a community security guard eager to prove his mettle to find a suspect in the assault of two teens.

episodes.name: The Grid Plan
episodes.overview: A Midwestern tourist is viciously attacked in Times Square. As the squad scours the area for clues, the victim takes the investigation into her own hands. A secret motive threatens to derail Carisi's case.

episodes.name: Undertow
episodes.overview: A complicated case of sex and drug use divides the squad. Carisi must convince a jury to focus on the law and not the defendant's accusations.

episodes.name: Let Me Bring Pardon
episodes.overview: The doctor of a comatose woman calls SVU when he discovers his patient is pregnant. Benson must convince the family to reject magical thinking and look at the facts.

episodes.name: Accomplice Liability
episodes.overview: Carisi attempts to put aside his role as prosecutor to serve as a witness in a trial. Benson tries to help a rape survivor struggling with her recovery.

episodes.name: The Accuser
episodes.overview: When a man is ruthlessly assaulted and burned, the SVU's investigation uncovers a decades-old secret. Bruno helps a young witness find the courage to come forward.

episodes.name: Play with Fire (2)
episodes.overview: When the SVU and the 2-7 uncover a pattern of rape and murder targeting marginalized women, Carisi and ADA Price team up to charge the suspect with multiple crimes.

episodes.name: Shock Collar
episodes.overview: When a car with a young girl in the backseat is stolen, the SVU investigates whether it was a crime of opportunity or a targeted abduction.

episodes.name: Aperture
episodes.overview: When an assault at gunpoint is witnessed through a neighboring window, the squad scrambles to locate the victim to confirm she's safe. A threat to extort the victim's family leads to a shocking suspect.

episodes.name: Post-Rage
episodes.overview: Benson investigates a string of sexual assaults targeting local female psychiatrists. The squad celebrates a promotion.

episodes.name: In the Wind
episodes.overview: Danger swirls around the squad as they investigate a suspect for rape and try to protect their key witness. A new chief of detectives puts Benson to the test. An off-duty Fin tries to stop an assault in progress.

episodes.name: A Waiver of Consent
episodes.overview: When a member of an elite social club is assaulted, Carisi must convince witnesses to come forward despite the club's strict confidentiality rules. Chief Tynan offers Benson some extra help. Velasco is confronted with a surprising opportunity.

episodes.name: The Vicious Circle
episodes.overview: Bruno suspects a bomb was planted to destroy DNA evidence in a rape case. Benson takes on a murder investigation connected to the bombing. Griffin experiences the frustrating setbacks of working an SVU case.

episodes.name: Clickbait
episodes.overview: When a tween suffers a life-threatening miscarriage, the SVU must unravel a web of online fabrications to identify a suspect. Rollins carefully weighs her career options.

episodes.name: Feed the Craving
episodes.overview: When a woman in active labor is abducted, Rollins and Curry look to her doula for an account of events. Carisi tries to get a confession in front of the jury. Benson looks to the past for answers on a personal matter.

episodes.name: Under the Influence
episodes.overview: The squad investigates an assault at a house party where no one can identify the assailant. When two suspects are detained for questioning, Rollins takes the chance to turn one against the other.

episodes.name: False Idols
episodes.overview: The SVU must determine fact from fantasy when a famous author twists the details of a serious crime. Fin has a challenging day at work.

episodes.name: Showdown
episodes.overview: When a man claims his girlfriend was kidnapped, Bruno investigates the holes in his story. Tynan comes down hard on Benson after a disagreement. Griffin must defend his policework on the stand.

episodes.name: Purity (2)
episodes.overview: The hunt for a murder suspect uncovers a crime with shocking legal and ethical implications. Bruno must protect his squad during a raid on a suspect's home. Carisi and Price team up in court when Brady's interrogation tactics undermine the case. Part 2 of a two-part crossover with Season 25, Episode 9 of 'Law & Order'.
